name: Not On My Shift!
description:
It's your shift doing maintenance on an old rusty spaceship. Everything was calm  and peaceful until a loud bang wakes you up and you realize the ship stopped. Can you fix everything and still manage to go back to your beauty sleep?

Controls: 

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • SHIFT to run
  • MOUSE to look around
  • LMB - pick up, drop or interact with objects
  • RMB - rotate objects
  • H to get an hint
  • ESC to pause 

----------------------

This was made for my second ever game jam participation and my first completed 3d game. It started as an escape room game (and still kind of is) but it turned more into an exploration, funny little first person puzzle game. 

The game is pretty easy to beat but i hope you have a good time playing it. 

If you find any major errors please let me know :)

(We are aware of the clipping through the walls bug! xD)
